tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.conftest module¶

tests.conftest.pytest_addoption(parser)¶
tests.conftest.pytest_generate_tests(metafunc)¶

parameterize command line options to inject into every test, specifically vendor If a vendor is passed on command line, use that, else use all vendors

tests.test_multiweather_request module¶

tests.test_multiweather_request.api_request(vendor, params, scope='session')¶

get one request to re-use for multiple tests

tests.test_multiweather_request.expected_vendor_parms(vendor)¶

This will provide a list of parms that a vendor should have in their test package. Retrieved from the .env file.

tests.test_multiweather_request.get_items(dictionary)¶
tests.test_multiweather_request.is_date(datestring)¶
tests.test_multiweather_request.is_number(string)¶
tests.test_multiweather_request.params(vendor, recent_datetimes)¶

load parameters from .env file keyed on vendor name (upper case)

tests.test_multiweather_request.recent_datetimes()¶

datetimes range for requesting data, based on current time
